CustomField.formula:
IF( ISBLANK(Adverse_Action_Date__c), (TEXT(FLOOR((DATEVALUE(File_Date_Time__c) - Date_of_Hire__c)/365.2425)) & " year(s)"&", " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((DATEVALUE(File_Date_Time__c) - Date_of_Hire__c),365.2425)/30)) & " month(s)"&", "& TEXT(Floor(MOD(Floor(MOD((DATEVALUE(File_Date_Time__c) - Date_of_Hire__c),365.2425)),30))) & " day(s)"&"; total of "&TEXT(DATEVALUE(File_Date_Time__c) - Date_of_Hire__c)&" day(s)"),
TEXT(FLOOR((Adverse_Action_Date__c - Date_of_Hire__c)/365.2425)) & " year(s)"&", " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((Adverse_Action_Date__c - Date_of_Hire__c),365.2425)/30)) & " month(s)"&", "& TEXT(Floor(MOD(Floor(MOD((Adverse_Action_Date__c - Date_of_Hire__c),365.2425)),30))) & " day(s)"&"; total of "&TEXT(Adverse_Action_Date__c - Date_of_Hire__c)&" day(s)" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Adverse Action Date Minus Date of Hire. If Adverse Action Date is blank, leave field blank.
